Sentencas: Electrophoretic deposition (EPD) is a powerful route to obtain thick coatings onto conductive substrates, The system ZrO2/Ni is widely considered for technological applications, such as solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: EPD is usually performed using nonaqueous suspensions in which problems related to electrolysis are avoided.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: However, the possibility for using aqueous systems is receiving an increased interest due to economical and ecological benefits.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: In this work, the processing conditions for obtaining ZrO2 deposits from aqueous suspensions are studied.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The dispersing characteristics of the slips are studied in terms of zeta potential and conductivity.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The kinetics of the process is analyzed for optimized dispersing conditions considering the deposited mass and thickness.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Deviations in current density and powder concentration are considered the two reasons that deposition kinetics can deviate from linear Hamaker growth.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: In his work, both parameters have been controlled, but deviations from linearity still occur.
Titulo: Zirconia thick films deposited on nickel by aqueous electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Hence, other parameters not considered in the literature are affecting the aqueous EPD kinetics.
